title: 'Ya b*****d!' Holly Willoughby mimics Mel B with foul-mouthed impression
text:
Holly Willoughby and her new Celebrity Juice co-star Mel B seem to have struck up quite the rapport.

The team leaders are seen mocking each other in a new clip for Thursday night's episode, in which Holly is asked to impersonate Scary Spice.

Asked by host Keith Lemon to take on the task, Holly replies: 'I don't know that I can!'

Scroll down for video

Bonding: Holly Willoughby and her new Celebrity Juice co-star Mel B seem to have struck up quite the rapport - seen mocking each other in a new clip for Thursday night's episode

She then tries to copy Mel's northern drawl, saying: 'I don't know!'

Giving it a final stab, Holly blurts out: 'Ya b*****d!'

In another vocally-inspired moment, Keith asks Mel's teammate Adam Lambert if its true that his voice is insured for $48m.

'No!' the crooner says.

'Have you got your voice insured?' Keith asks Wannabe songstress Mel.

Asked by host Keith Lemon to mimic Mel, Holly replies: 'I don't know that I can'

A laugh a minute: Holly is asked to impersonate Scary Spice in the comical clip

Have a go: Giving it a final stab, Holly blurts out: 'Ya b*****d!'

'I think I have!' she laughs. 'Well, I think the [Spice Girls] has!'

Keith then asks pointedly: 'What, even Victoria [Beckham].'

Posh Spice famously sat out the mega-successful Spice Girls reunion this summer, which saw Mel team up once again with Mel C, Geri Horner and Emma Bunton for a 13-date UK tour.

Victoria chose to stick to working on her eponymous fashion line, deciding not to return to her pop star roots.

Earlier on Wednesday, however, she mentioned her Spice days in an Instagram post.

Unrecognisable: In the picture, the singer turned fashion designer, 45, looked almost unrecognisable as she wore a full face of heavy make-up including smokey eyeshadow (pictured in throwback snap, left, and in 2018, right)

Fun: Writing a witty caption, the star penned alongside the snap: 'Posh likes to use @victoriabeckhambeauty Lip Definer No. 2 + 3. What’s #yourperfectnude? X Kisses VB.'

Stardom: Victoria rose to fame as Posh Spice in the hit 90s girl band Spice Girls (pictured together at the height of their fame in the 90s)

In the picture, the singer turned fashion designer, 45, looked almost unrecognisable as she wore a full face of heavy make-up including smokey eyeshadow.

Wearing her signature brunette bob and a skimpy beige vest top, Victoria posed to the camera while applying a slick of lip liner.

Writing a witty caption, the star penned alongside the snap: 'Posh likes to use @victoriabeckhambeauty Lip Definer No. 2 + 3. What’s #yourperfectnude? X Kisses VB.'

Victoria is currently promoting her new beauty range in New York.
description: Holly Willoughby and her new Celebrity Juice co-star Mel B seem to have struck up quite the rapport.
